headline: Kristina Schake to Depart as Chief Communications Officer of The Walt Disney Company
summary: BURBANK, Calif., February 24, 2026--The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) today announced that Kristina Schake, Senior Executive Vice President and Chief Communications Officer, will depart the company after March 18, 2026, coinciding with the end of Bob Iger’s tenure as Chief Executive Officer. Schake, who joined Disney in 2022, has served as a member of the company’s senior management team and advisor to the CEO and Board of Directors, helping to advance Disney’s business and strategic objective

headline: Disney OpenAI Deal Tests Monetization Of Iconic Characters Through AI Video
summary: Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS) has announced a new partnership with OpenAI that allows Disney characters to appear in OpenAI’s next generation video generator, Sora. The agreement covers major franchises such as Star Wars, Pixar, and Marvel, opening the door to AI powered video experiences featuring Disney intellectual property. The news highlights Disney’s push into advanced technology and potential new ways to use its content library. For investors watching NYSE:DIS, this move connects one of the...

headline: United Kingdom Movies and Entertainment Market Report 2025-2033 Featuring Paramount, Sony, Walt Disney, Warner Bros, Comcast, Netflix, Vivendi, The Idea Factory, Amazon, The Marcs Studios
summary: The UK Movies and Entertainment Market is projected to grow from US$ 3.97 billion in 2025 to US$ 6.74 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 6.83%. Key growth factors include rapid digital technology adoption, increased online advertising, and the expansion of streaming and mobile platforms. The market thrives on a strong creative ecosystem, global appeal, and the resurgence of live events. headline: S&P 500 expected to start flat as new Trump tariffs begin
summary: A moderately positive start for US stocks is expected on Tuesday, after Donald Trump's new 10% global tariff kicked in overnight. Nasdaq futures were up 0.2%, while those for the Dow Jones were pointing to a 0.1% gain, while S&P 500 futures were flat. The previous day, the Dow fell...

headline: UK To Regulate Streaming Services Like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+ Like Traditional Broadcasters
summary: The UK government has announced that streaming services such as Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ: NFLX), Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) Prime Video, and Disney+ from Walt Disney Co. (NYSE: DIS) will now be regulated under the same rules as traditional broadcasters like the BBC.

headline: Robert Downey Jr. Named Godparent of Disney Adventure
summary: Today, Disney announced Academy Award-winning actor Robert Downey Jr. will be the godparent for the Disney Adventure, the newest and largest ship in the Disney Cruise Line fleet. Disney shared the news ahead of the vessel's maiden voyage next month out of its home port in Singapore.

summary: Adeia (NASDAQ:ADEA) executives said the company closed out 2025 with record results and entered 2026 with early deal momentum, highlighted by new licensing agreements in media and semiconductors and a multi-year license agreement signed with Microsoft early in the year.
